name: SCP01Intercept
short_description:
A command line tool for Global Platform secure channel protocol 01 (SCP01) decryption.

Since this tool is currently targeted toward advanced users / programmers who are willing to make tweaks to the code, I will not be distributing binaries.  While I'm new to CMake, I believe I have a simple build system working for both Windows and Linux.  See the "README" file for more information.

Please keep in mind that I do not intend to provide support for this software to the novice user.  If you find bugs or would like to see new features, by all means file a ticket, but for questions pertaining to Global Platform, smart cards, and such, I'll probably refer you to the open specifications.  :-)  Peace.
summary: A tool for Global Platform secure channel protocol 01 decryption.
